K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rab dag cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-17: yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-18: skal pa ldan pa'i mdun du ni; ;chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-19: nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-20: rang rgyal dag gi mngon dga' la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-21: chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-23: mi shes pas ni spong ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-24: mos pa med par skyes pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-25: bsod nams mang po 'byung med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-27: ting nge 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-28: gal te de lus sbyangs byas te; ;byang chub lam la brtson bya phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-29: la la thas dang de bral ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-30: 'khor dang gang zag rnams kyis kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:246b-31: sems kyi rtog par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-1: la; ;stong pa zhi ba smra bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-2: de yang myur du spangs pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-3: mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-4: gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-6: dmyal ba yi dvags byol song du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-7: lha ma yin dang lus srul po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-8: gnod sbyin srin po gtum pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-10: mir gyur dka' byed thob pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-11: gal te ji ltar thob na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-12: smad pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-13: 'on pa long ba zhar pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-14: rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-15: skur pa 'debs shing mchod pa byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-16: zas dang skom dang bral pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-17: mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-18: pha dang ma la bkur sti med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-19: nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-20: sems can rnams la snying rje med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-22: 'dir ni rab tu song ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-23: dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-24: yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-26: lus dbang byas pa'i sems can 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-27: gang gis bzod pa 'di bsten cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-28: thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-29: des ni dge slong de song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-30: ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-31: pha rol sems la lta ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-33: sems can kun la sman par smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-34: thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247a-35: thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-0: @247b de 'dra ba yi chos kyang shod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na drin po ches 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-3: ji lta bur nyan thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sengge'i khri ba shams te nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-4: zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-6: yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-7: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmigs pa sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-8: bdag dang sems can gzhan la'ang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam mo; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-10: gang gi dus la bab par shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-12: thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-13: ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:247b-14: grol dang rig la khyod ni dang bar mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-1: bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-2: rgyal ba nyi ma grol la mar me mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-3: sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-4: lam rnams rab ston la ma ni khyod ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-5: mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstan par mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-6: nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-7: thugs dam mi g-yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-8: thub pa 'jig rten zla ba 'od 'dra ba; ;tshul mdog bzod pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-9: snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-10: khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-11: rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-12: bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-13: thub pa sengge mu stegs 'jigs par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-14: 'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la pingka'i skad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-15: mu stegs can gyi 'khor mang rnam 'jig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-16: mar me'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-17: sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-18: bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khro mi mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-19: mthon po ma yin da ltar mtho min pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-20: yongs min gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-21: ye shes mchog gis nga yi nga rgyal gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-22: rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-23: des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-24: las kyi me yis sred pa'i chu yang bskams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-25: khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred chu tshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-26: klu lta bu rin chos kyi char gtong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248a-27: des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-0: yongs su smin la @248b gzigs shing bzod 'di gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-1: sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-2: bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-3: gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-4: de thob pa yi yon tan 'di mtha' yas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-5: spyod yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-6: thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-7: da ltar gyi yang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-8: thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-11: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par nga yang dgongs so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-13: spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzod pa 'di stan nas ji lta bu'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:248b-14: zhes bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-0: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin des @249a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-1: bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-5: drang srong de'ang rgan po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-8: skra ring po'i ral pa 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-12: gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sreg chen po 'bar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-13: de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-14: kha dog mtha' yas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-15: kha dog brgya stong du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-16: kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-17: de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i zhing stong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-18: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i skar ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-25: lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-28: yi dvags kyi lta ba'ang mi mngon mi snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-29: de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-37: rlung gi sgra'ang mi grag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249a-38: de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-1: yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par nyan thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-2: rang rgyal pa'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-4: yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-5: rang sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'ang ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-7: de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khor der 'dug pa de de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-8: de byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-9: gang yang 'dir 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na cung zad gzugs snang ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-10: snang ba rgya chen pos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-11: 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-12: de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes koo di n+ya la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-15: koo di n+ya sa smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-16: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-19: de nas nyan thos chen po des 'od srung chen po la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-20: sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-21: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-23: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhes bya ba mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:249b-25: de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-0: shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan @250a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-1: gyis khyod mchog tu bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-2: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-7: de nas nyan thos chen po des moonggal ya na la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-8: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal ya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-9: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-10: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-12: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa de nyid na bdag gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-14: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gnag na bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-17: de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-18: lha'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-19: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-23: khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-25: kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-26: bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250a-27: gang du bzhud ces bya ba dag kyang mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-2: yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-3: bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-5: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-6: gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' la dri snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-7: de nas nyan thos chen po des byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-10: 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis phung po bshad par byas pa de na dge slong drug cu tsam po stan las langs te dong pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-12: bcom ldan 'das thugs mi dgyes nas btang snyoms shing 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs cig tu spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-13: bdag cag ni; rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-14: de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-15: bam po gnyis pa; de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:250b-16: gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa de bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-1: blta bar bya'o snyam pa de thams cad rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na drang srong chen po sh'akya thub pa rgas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-8: skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-9: drang srong chen po 'di nus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-10: drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya snyam mo; ;de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nye bar dod ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-13: gzungs dbang du byas pa de sems rtse gcig pa'i stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pa de nyid kyi tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251a-21: mi yin pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis drang srong gi tsha byad kyis drang srong sh'akya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-0: 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos kyi ngad @251b ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa la'ang 'jug par bzhed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sams kyis shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing lam der drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ril nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-3: de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-8: yid yod la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag drug cu tsam lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-14: mu s'a ra gal pa la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba gser gyi shing la dngul gyi lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-17: dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-19: 'bras bu nas mu s'a ra gal pa'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-21: 'bras bu'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:251b-22: shing ta la'i phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-0: lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zhing dpag tshad bcu pa @252a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-2: lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas mu s'a ra gal pa'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-3: gser gyi shing ta la dngul gyi snying po 'phyang ba nas mu s'a ra gal pa'i bar du smra bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-4: 'og logs su bee d'urya bzang po nas gong logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du rgya chen pos spa bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-5: sprin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma brdal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-6: rdzing de dag la'ang lha rdzas kyi me tog autpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-17: gandha dha nu ska ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-22: mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-23: sa bla na gnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam sbyong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-24: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi ma gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252a-25: rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la lha rdzas kyi gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-0: 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi @252b khang bu brtsegs ma mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-1: khang bu brtsegs ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-2: khang bu brtsegs ma de la'ang lha rdzas kyi do shal sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-4: rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-5: me tog sna tshogs kyi kun tu gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-6: khang bu brtsegs ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-7: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rol mo dkrol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-8: klu'i sgra bsgrags pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-9: klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi char phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-10: dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-11: lha rdzas kyi me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-12: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-18: ro tsa ka chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-22: tsakra chen po 'od dri ma med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-28: kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:252b-29: rtag tu me tog 'od snang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-0: mig gis mngon par dga' ba rnam pa sna @253a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-1: tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-3: char ba'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du mdag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-4: thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-5: klu'i glang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis yang dag par gnas shing 'di lta ste; mu tig sngon po'i char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-6: go shirsha'i snying po'i char la sogs te char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-7: gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-20: grul bum gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-23: 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-27: rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-29: glu sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253a-30: gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-1: nam mkha' lding gi bu mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-2: lha ma yin gyi bu mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-4: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rol mo brdung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-10: shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis khad kyis rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-11: mi'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-12: tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-13: brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-14: mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-15: dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal pa'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-16: klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang mthun pa'i tsandan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:253b-17: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kun tu reg pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-1: dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-2: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan por gyur pa gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-3: grul bum brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan po'i cha byad kyis gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'chang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su 'khod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-4: bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-5: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-6: lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-7: klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-8: dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254a-9: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis tsandan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so; ;lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rgyan gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-0: nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis @254b dzambu chu klung gi gser gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-1: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-2: sa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-3: bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha' la 'phyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-4: bdud brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-5: drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-6: drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog mand'a ra ba chen po blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir rnyog pa sel ba nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mchams sbyor ba'i char rab tu 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po kun tu gnon par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-8: lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:254b-9: dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od zer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-0: de nas lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa @255a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-1: lha bran brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-2: sems can mi srun grol byed rkang gnyis mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-3: mnyes dka' rgyal ba gzungs ngan 'dren mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-4: sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-5: rgyal ba rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-6: sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-7: 'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-8: bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-9: khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-10: 'gro la phyin ci log bzhi rnam par grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-11: 'khor bzhi dag gis zhabs la bsnyen bkur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-12: 'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-13: zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-14: thub pa phung po lnga 'dir ba ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-15: 'dod pa lnga las skye bo rnam grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-16: 'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-17: 'gro ba lnga yi btson ra rnam par bkrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-18: dbang po drug 'dul gnas pa skyon med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-19: sred lus drug la shin tu rnam grol shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-20: sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255a-21: spos kyi ngad ldan ri 'dir gshegs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-0: @255b rgyal ba mnyam gzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-1: shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-2: ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-3: kha lo rab sgyur spos ngad ri 'dir spyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-4: rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-5: ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-6: khyod ni mun pas bsgribs pa la ye shes ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-7: thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol; ;dzambu'i gling 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-8: 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-9: mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-10: mi yi 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegs gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-11: sbyin dang 'dul ba gtong zhing dul ba'i thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-12: sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-13: sems can dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-14: spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-15: bar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-16: bar 'gar rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-17: dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-18: thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod pa rab tu ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-19: w'a ra n'a sir 'khor lo dam pa bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-20: shes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod gcig gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-21: 'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-22: spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir bzod pa gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:255b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha du mas mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa' du mas bskor nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-0: de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong @256a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-1: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-3: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-6: gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-8: gang chu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-10: mig gis gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-11: gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de'ang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-14: zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-15: nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-16: 'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-17: de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-18: log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-19: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-20: rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g-yos pa 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256a-21: snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan sngar gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug @256b pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-1: ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer snang ba de me tog mand'a ra ba chen por kun tu gnas par 'dug par gyur to; ;'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-3: gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-4: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gangg'a gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-5: de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dar de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de drang srong gi gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:256b-10: gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-1: nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-3: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-4: gang me tog mer snang ba bee d'urya'i dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-5: theg pa chen po 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-11: dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257a-14: bzod pa 'di thog ma dang tha ma ji lta bu zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-0: mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug @257b pa'o; ;da ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can chu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams la sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-1: chu bo bzhi gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-5: ma rig pa'i chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-6: de dag las sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-7: dad pa mi phyed pa bzhi yang dag par len du 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-9: so sor dgod par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-11: sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-12: sems can rnams yang dag par len du 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-14: so sor dgod par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-15: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-16: tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can rnams lta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-18: shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-19: rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-20: sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-21: chos la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:257b-22: dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-1: khrims kyis lta bar song ba thams cad spang ba la ston par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-2: sbyin pas sems can rnams tshe'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-3: ngag snyan pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-4: don byed pas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-5: don mthun pas sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-7: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-10: bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdag cag nye bar mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal des yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la dbab par shes na zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-12: de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-13: bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal de gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258a-14: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis dang spyi bos phyag btsal nas g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-0: skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas phyag @258b btsal te 'khod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-1: de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis shar phyogs kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-2: rnam par ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad gcig ma gcig gis lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-3: de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gangg'a'i bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te; de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-5: byang chub sems dpa' glog gi mchog ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gi cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-10: sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su zhus pa de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du bshad pa nas de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-11: de na 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:258b-12: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-1: po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi chu bo gangg'a gsum gyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-2: de na rgyan gcig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-3: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-4: tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gangg'a gcig gi bye ma las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-5: de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-6: de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259a-7: byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gangg'a bdun gyi bye ma snyed nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-0: de na 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong @259b ba chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-1: de na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-2: bdud rtsi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-3: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sh'akya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-4: mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-5: drang srong gi cha byad kyis ma gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-6: rgyan de dag la nyan thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-7: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas mi mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-10: sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po gdan de las bzhengs te thub pa dbang po'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-13: tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-14: gnya' shing du lta ba'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-17: dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-20: lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:259b-22: rgyal ba nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-1: ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing sangs rgyas chen por rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-3: sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'degs pa dang 'dor bas bzhud nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-4: dka' thub kyi gnas gtsang ma 'di tha dad pa med cing dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te glang po'i rnam par blta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na'ang 'di brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-5: la la gang 'dir bstan dang ldan pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-6: byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-7: bdag gis yang dag pa spyad pa bstan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-8: de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-9: byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs med gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-10: da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-11: chos la bdag med rab tu mi shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-12: bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-13: kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-14: sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-15: thabs la mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-16: de dag thams cad 'ong na bdag ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260a-17: brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-0: thabs la mkhas pa sems can rnams @260b 'dul zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-1: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-2: bzod nyan thos phyir de dag thams cad 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-3: gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-4: 'dus byas thams cad 'di la brten pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-5: chu zla lta bur rab tu su ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-6: rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-7: gang rnams thabs dang yang dag sbyor phyir zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-8: thams cad dngos la sems dpa' rten med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-9: mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-10: dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-11: bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-12: ji ltar sdug bsngal kun la mi gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo la'ang khyod myur 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-14: srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-15: phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-16: 'gro ba rnams la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-17: da dung theg pa'i dam tshig gang 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-18: bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-19: lan gnyis su yang 'khor lo bdag bskor te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-20: phyir mi ldog la sems can bye bkod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-21: rnam par grol ba'i blo mtshan rab thogs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-22: bdag bdag zhing rnams su yang 'gro bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-23: sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-24: byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-25: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:260b-26: de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi @261a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-1: dkyil 'khor de'ang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-3: tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med par song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-4: de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-5: bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-7: de ltar mngon par dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-8: de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-10: de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-13: yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der de phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-14: dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-15: gser gyi phung po ji ltar 'bar ba la drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon sum du phyag 'tsal te ha cang yang mi ring bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-16: mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-19: drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-20: snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-21: gal te snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rjes su 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261a-22: drang srong gi cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-0: dbyibs @261b kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-1: bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-2: drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-4: de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las drang srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-5: mtshungs pa med cing dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-6: chu bo gangg'a'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyi drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas drang srong thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bstod de 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-8: la la smon lam gyi dbang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-9: la la ngan song du spyod pa'i rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran pa so sor thob nas drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-10: drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na ba de logs su'ang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:261b-12: sh'akya thub pa bzhugs shing ji lta bur 'khor yang dag par 'ongs pa la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-0: de nas de nyid kyi tshe na shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i @262a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-1: lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-2: rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-4: brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtseg pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-6: bdag gi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-8: tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-9: drang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs pa der bdag bzod pa 'di bstan snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-10: de nyid kyi tshe na lho phyogs na nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-11: rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-13: tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bur bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-16: tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston te snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262a-17: de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-0: @262b tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-2: bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-4: tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-5: de nas de nyid kyi tshe na byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa; rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-7: tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-8: de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-10: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir sengge'i khri la rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir sengge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam ste; de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:262b-12: khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-1: byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-4: chos kyi sgos chags pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyir de dung mi sgrub kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-5: 'di gnyis kyi 'khor ba 'khyil ba'i sgrub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-13: gang mi skye mi 'byung ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-16: de 'jig pa thams cad spangs nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-18: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-20: 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-24: bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-31: 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-33: 'di ni; gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-36: ma skyes par rtog pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-39: 'gog par rnam par mi rtog cing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263a-40: tha dad par bya ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-0: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la @263b 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-6: gang phung po yongs su shes shing skyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-8: rlom pa sems thams cad bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-9: gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-10: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-12: rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-14: gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rlom sems med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-15: g-yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-16: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-17: rigs kyi bu; gang tshor ba shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-18: tshor ba kun 'byung bar shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-19: tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-20: tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-23: gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro ba mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-25: tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-28: mtshan nyid tha dad pa mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-29: mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-30: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-34: skye mched la nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:263b-36: bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-1: kyi bu; gang yang nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-6: skye mched la brten par mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-7: yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-10: spros pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-11: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-12: rigs kyi bu; gang dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-13: mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-15: tshu rol la 'du shes pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-19: mi dge ba 'di'ang mtshan ma med pa kun nas ldang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-20: mi zad pa kun tu rtog pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-21: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-25: pha rol ni; phyin ci log ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-26: gang tshu rol dang pha rol la rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-29: gang yang tshu rol dang pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-31: ci'ang btags pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-33: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-35: gzhan yang gang phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-37: skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-38: zag pa med pa zhes rtog pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264a-41: skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-0: zag pa med pa'i @264b 'du shes su bya ba'ang med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-1: 'du shes dang 'du shes med min thob pa'ang med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-6: 'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-8: gang yang 'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-9: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-10: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-12: gang yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la snyems pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-14: gang la la 'jig rten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la mi 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-19: rnam par grol ba med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-21: gzhan yang gang la la ming dang gzugs las phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-23: skye mched 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-28: ming dang gzugs bral ba la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi lta ba kun tu 'gro zhing kun tu mi 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-29: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:264b-31: gzhan yang gang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-1: pa'o; ;gang yang 'byung ba med pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa la 'dus byas thams cad du myur du rab tu shes pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-3: gzhan yang bdag gir bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-4: rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-6: skye mched la chags pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-8: gang la la bdag dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-9: bdag gi rang bzhin lta ba gnyis dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-10: skye mched nyams pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-12: nga yir bya ba dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-13: 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-14: gang la la rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-15: rnam par grol bar rtog pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-19: rgyu ba med cing bdag med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-21: glog gi rang bzhin can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-22: rnam par grol ba'ang nam mkha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-24: rtog par byed pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-25: spros pa med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-26: gang rnam par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-27: gzugs kun tu spyod pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-29: gzugs nyid kyang nam mkha' bzhin du stong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265a-31: gzugs 'jig pa stong pa nyid gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rgyu ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-1: rnam par shes pa rab tu rgyu ba med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-2: nam mkha' ji lta bur mun pa med cing snang ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-3: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-4: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa stong pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-5: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyang stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-6: de bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'ang nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar stong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-7: nam mkha' ji lta bur 'dod chags med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-11: mi rtog rnam par mi rtog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-12: mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro bar de ltar sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-13: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-20: mi rtog rnam par mi rtog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-21: mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro zhing nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-24: mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-26: byang chub sems dpa' gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-27: byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas 'di bstan pa ston pa na byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig khrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:265b-28: byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-1: ldan 'das kyang sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong gi cha byad ji tsam ba mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-2: sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku yang dag par brgyan te bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-3: de ltar de bzhin du gang gzhan la la dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-4: sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-7: khyod kyis ji lta bur bstan pa de bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sgo 'di bstan par bya ba legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-10: chos kyi sgo 'di la lus dpang du btsugs te de ltar khyod kyis tshad med pa'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266a-18: mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-0: de nas de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de glos su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la chos bstan du gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i yon @266b tan 'di dag gis bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-1: rgyal ba mi mnyam zhing mang dag khyab pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-2: nyon mongs dgra zhi 'di la mngon par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-3: thub pa shin tu rnam grol 'dir zhugs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-4: khyod kyis 'gro la bzod pa'i mchog 'di ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-5: rab tu zhi thugs brtul zhugs yongs su dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-6: thub pa'i mchod sbyin bgyis pa bzod dge gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-7: 'gro la bde sbyin drang srong shes rab 'chang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-8: gti mug 'jig mdzad 'di la bdud rtsi char //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-9: 'di la lha klu sems can mi mang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-10: shin tu gsal yid myur du zhing gang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-11: 'gro ba thams cad khyod zhal lta zhing 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-12: nyon mongs yongs su spangs te dam chos srungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-13: sngon chad rgyal ba khyod kyang kun spyod bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-14: mig gnyis rkang pa lag pa lce byin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-15: phags pa mgo khrag yan lag dang 'bru nor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:266b-16: glang rta bu grong shing rta rin chen rnam mang byin //
