K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-0: dka' thub ngan pa sna tshogs de @277b dag thams cad de'i che na der sengge'i khri yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-1: sengge'i khri de'i steng gi bar snang na rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bcu par byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-2: gdugs de la lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs su yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-3: rgyan de dag las log pa'i tshig gi tha snyad sna tshogs byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-9: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-10: 'dod pa la bde ba skye ba'i lta ba byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-11: 'thab cing gcig la gcig 'tshog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-14: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du lta ba spros pas lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi lta ba'i tshig gi tha snyad kyi dbyangs byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-15: gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med grangs med pa dag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sgra de nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-16: sengge'i khri la sems can tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-17: brtul zhugs ngan pa sna tshogs sbyor ba'i rjes su ldan pa de dag kyang lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:277b-18: kye ma kyi hud lta ba nyon mongs pa thob pa 'di dag rnyog pa lnga'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par mthong ba gang zhig ces de mchog tu skyo ba'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-0: bdag cag rang rang gi sangs @278a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-1: rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-2: de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las 'gro bar 'dod kyang de dag rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro bar mi shes nas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dag rnam par 'grel ba gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'dod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu lta ba stug pos bsgribs shing dog pa thob pas bdag cag kyang cung zad lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-9: yid kyis 'khrul bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir bdag cag myur du 'gro bar 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-10: bdag cag kyang phyogs thams cad mgo 'khor bar gyur nas yang bdag cag rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro ba mi shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-12: khyod bdag cag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar nus pa nyams su longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par lhags pa de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278a-15: ci khyed cag theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas yun ring @278b ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-2: byang chub 'dod pa rnams 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can dmyal bar skye ba la brtson pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-4: de bzhin du byol song dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-6: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-10: de bzhin du lta ba tha dad par song zhing dogs pa rnyed pa'i mu stegs can gzhan la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis der skye ba blangs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsal po che zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-12: ci lta bur gnas de dang de dag tu brtson 'grus brtan pa pha rol gnon pas nye bar phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-14: mi shes pa'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-15: tshe'i dgon par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i zhi ba'i lam rab tu nyams pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-17: srog chags su gyur pa la mi dge ba bcu'i las la brtson pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-18: lta ba ngan pa rdzogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-19: 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa med par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-20: rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sems can la snying brtso pa'i phyir bdag gi lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal la mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:278b-21: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can gcig kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rab tu mos par nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-1: bcu'i las kyi lam la las kyi lam gcig gis kyang sa bon bskyed cing 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-2: legs par smras pa gcig gis kyang rna bar go bar nus pas sems can re re'i phyir yang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnam pa du ma sna tshogs su mngon par brtson no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gang gis bgos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-6: bdud bzhi 'dzin cing byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-8: sems can gyi go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi go cha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-11: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi go cha gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-12: rigs kyi bu; gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis mos shing pha rol gnon par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson zhing byams pa sgom pas phongs pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-14: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-15: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-16: dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-17: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279a-18: yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad las bkar ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-0: snying rje chen pos lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis las yongs su grol @279b bar byed pa bdag gis kyang yang da bzhin du sems can nyon mongs pa'i skyabs su bslab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-1: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-5: don mthun pas sems can mgu bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-6: sbyin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can mgu bar byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-9: skom nas mgo'i bar du sbyin pas gang sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-10: thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-12: gang sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-13: mtshan ma yongs su byin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-14: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-15: gang de na dngos po la dmigs pa'i rab tu zhi ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-16: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-17: gang dngos po thams cad yongs su btang ste yul la ma bzod pa med pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-19: gang dngos po yongs su btang ste dben par sbyod pa'i phyir 'byung ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-21: gang dngos po yongs su btang ste las thams cad la kun tu mi spyod pa 'di la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:279b-22: gang dngos po yongs su sbyin pa'i phyir bdag gi yid la mi sems shing dngos po de la dben par sems pa la rnam par smin par mi 'dod pas len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-3: rnam par bsal ba med pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-4: yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas dong che gcig byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-6: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma dang lhan cig pas 'di ltar slob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-7: lus med pa'i phyir longs spyod chen po'i sbyin pa rnam par mi sgrub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-8: longs spyod chen po'i rgyus sbyin pa rnam par mi spong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-9: longs spyod chen po'i sbyin pa yang dag par mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-10: rang bzhin gyis stobs 'dzin pa 'di'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-11: gang 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-12: sbyin pa byin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-13: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pas sbyin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-14: brtson 'grus kyis mtshan nyid la mi 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-15: dran pa'i stobs mi skye mi 'gog pa la dmigs pas sbyin pa byin pa 'di'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-18: dran pa'i yul la yang dag par rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280a-19: len pa dang dor ba med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi yul la mi khom par dmigs shing snyems pa med pa 'di ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-0: bzod pa'i pha rol @280b tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-1: gang yang sbyin pa de dmigs pa thams cad kun ldang ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-2: rnam par spyod pas lam mi mthun pa yongs su spangs pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la reg pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-5: dma' zhing rab tu nyams pa'i lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-6: tshig pas gdungs pa rnams snying rje thams cad kyis yongs su bskyabs te zhi ba'i lam du gzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-7: dban par spyod pa la bdag bde bar skyed cing theg pa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-9: gang sbyin pa de las thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs shing yul thams cad ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas stong pa'i grong bzhin du rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-10: mtshan ma thams cad la blo med cing dngos po med par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-11: 'dod chags thams cad rkyen la rag las shing bla na med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-12: rtog pa thams cad lus med mtshan nyid skad cig tu 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-13: gnas thams cad yod pa ma yin zhing mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-14: kun nas mi ldang ba'i mtshan nyid du rtog pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;gang sbyin pa de bdag la sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:280b-17: rnam par smin pa 'dod par sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-0: len pa rnam par rtog par sems pa de las 'dod pa'i khams kyi @281a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-1: phung po la mi gnas pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-2: sa'i khams la len pa dang dor ba med pa'i sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-7: rnam par shes pa'i khams la blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-9: rang sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-11: khams la nam mkha' kun nas ldang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-12: gzugs kyi rang bzhin la rnam par mi dmigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-19: chos la rang bzhin rnam par mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-20: dran pa'i stobs kyis sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-21: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir mtshan ma rgyun mi bcad pa'i sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-22: sbyin pa de sgrol ba'i rnam par mi dmigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-23: ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir 'dres pa med cing 'chi 'pho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-24: skye ba'i sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-26: gzhan yang sbyin pa de bdag mi shes shing longs spyod thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub pa bde ba thams cad skye ba la bzod pa 'dren pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-27: brtson 'grus kyis sems can la mtha' thug pa med cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-28: mtshan ma thams cad la blang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281a-30: bsam gtan la 'dug pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-0: khams @281b gsum la shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-1: dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' dong tshe gcig sbyin pa byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-2: rnam pa de lta bu'i sems bskyed pas yongs su bsngos bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-4: rang sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir shin tu brtan par mos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la reg pa skyed par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-7: mu stegs can 'dul ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-10: sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i las thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgrub pa'i dge ba bcu'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar byad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-12: bdag gir bya ba'i lta ba thob pa de tshul khrims la nan tan byed cing dka' thub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-13: brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-15: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-16: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-17: sdug bsngal yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-18: bdag sems can dmyal ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:281b-20: gshin rje'i 'jig rten ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pas skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282a-0: bdag kyang de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i brtson 'grus brtan pa pha rol gnon pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis der @282a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282a-6: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon dang slob dpon ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug cing bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282a-7: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282a-8: mngon par 'du mi byed par brtags nas yul thams cad kyi bdud kyi lam spyod pas bdag tu lta bar byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-0: rnam pa de @282b lta bu'i sems can gyi go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-1: sems can yongs su smin pa'i rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-2: byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can dbul po dbul ba las yongs su thar par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-3: rig kyi bu; gzhan yang 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-4: sems can yongs su smin par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-5: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-6: ji lta bur bsam pas sems can yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-8: zang zing gi bsam pa'i sems can rnams zang zing gis yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-9: chos 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ji lta bur sems can rnams la gzugs dang mthun par chos bstan pas yongs su mgu bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-10: yongs su smin par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-12: gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin pas zang zing gi sbyin pa'ang sbyin pa'i len pa de dag la byams pa dang mthun par sems bskyed par bya ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-13: rab tu dga' ba skye ba'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-14: snying rje ci bya'o cog byed pa la brtson pa dag ba'i sems skye ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:282b-15: btang snyoms shing sdig pa mi byed pa dge ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-1: mthun pa dang ldan pa sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-2: don la rton pa bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-3: de'ang sbyin pa byin pa'i len pa rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-4: la la len pa rnams la byang chub sbyad pa spyod pa de dag skyo ba skyed par byed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-5: la la'ang yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la spyod pa'i rgyun bcad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-7: la la'ang phyir mi ldog pa rnams la ji lta bur skyes bu dam pa ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-8: bzod pa'i gzungs thob pas mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283a-11: bdag med pa dang ldan pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-0: la la'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi @283b zhing yongs su dag pa rnams rgyun bcad cing nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-1: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snying rje chen po skyed pa de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-3: de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing lta ba ngan pa dogs pa rnyed pa'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-5: thabs des sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sbyin pa'i dngos po rnams yang na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-10: chos kyi sbyin pa'i thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-13: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-15: de na gang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i mig gis lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-16: tshig snyan pas dga' bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-17: ngag 'jam pas slong ba po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-18: chos nyan pa rnams snyan pa la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-19: sems can yongs su sbyad pas sdig pa las phyir ldog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-20: lta bar song ba thams cad las phyir ldog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:283b-21: bral ba bzhi'i sems can rnams bzhi la 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-1: sems can rnams ngag snyan pa dang 'jam pas tshul khrims la 'god par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-2: sems can lta ba dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'god par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-3: sems can bsam pa dang bral ba rnams bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-4: sems can cho ga dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i cho ga la 'god par byed pa'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-5: de na sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la ji ltar 'god par byed; yang byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i tshig mi rtsub pa de'i drung du slong ba po nye bar phyin pa'i sems can de dag kyang bsam pa shin tu yongs su mgu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-6: de dag la mtshungs par ngag snyan pas gtam smra par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-7: de dag kyang 'dul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-8: sems can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur pa de dag thams cad ngag snyan pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par gzhog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-10: tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems can rnams tshul khrims la yang dag par gzhog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284a-13: sems can le lo can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par gzhog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-0: sems @284b can bdag bde bar 'dod pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par gzhog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-3: gzhan yang sems can le lo can rnams brtson 'grus rtsam pa la 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-4: ma dad pa rnams dad pa'i brtson 'grus la 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-5: thos pa nyung ba rnams mang du thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-6: 'chal ba'i shes rab can rnams shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-7: mi 'grogs pa'i sems can rnams 'grogs pa la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-8: gzhan yang sems can phar mi shes shing mar mi shes te ma gus pa rnams pha ma la gus shing nad pa la bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-9: drang srong la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-11: sems rtsub pa rnams byams pa la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-12: snying rje med pa'i sems can rnams snying rje la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-13: sems dma' ba can rnams dga' ba la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-14: sems kyis chags pa rnams btang snyoms la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-15: sems can ngan song gsum du 'gro ba rnams tshul khrims la bkod pas lha'i bde ba skye ba la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-16: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i sems can gyi nang na lhar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams bsam gtan la bkod pas gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:284b-17: sems can bsam gtan la chags pa rnams gzugs la 'jug pa snyoms par sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-1: med pa'i khams su snyoms par 'jug pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can rnams mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-4: bdag med pa la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-5: sems can bdag tu 'du shes pa la mngon par chags pa rnams nye bar len pa'i phung po la spang pa la mi 'jigs shing dbu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-8: ral gris 'phangs te gsod pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i sems can rnams la ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-9: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-10: gzhan yang sems can bstan pa ngan pa la rab tu mos shing sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-12: dge 'dun la mngon par mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ston par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-13: sangs rgyas la mi phyed par rab tu mos pa la rab tu gzhog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-14: rab tu 'god par byed pa nas chos dang dge 'dun gyi bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-15: gang log pa la lta ba'i sems can log par ston cing phyi rol gyi mu stegs can gyi tshul khrims la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de dag skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-16: dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-17: rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285a-19: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-0: 'god par @285b byed do; ;dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-1: 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims 'phags pa'i slob pa la sdom pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-3: mu stegs can gzhan gyi tshul khrims kyis ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i sems can dag gang gis lha dang mir skye ba thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can la mngon par 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-4: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la'ang de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-5: sems can 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims la zhugs pa rnams 'phags pa'i slob pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-6: gang gis zag pa med pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-7: sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi yul pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed; 'god par byed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-10: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:285b-12: de la 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-0: sems can pha rol la gnod pa @286a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-1: can gyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-2: sems can ma byin par len pa can rnams kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi nor la mi rku ba'i sems kyis gnas pa nas pha rol gyi chung ma la mi g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-3: brdzun du smra ba la mi slu ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-4: sems can thams cad la phra ma mi zer ba nas ngag mi rtsub pa'i bar du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-5: tshig kyal pa zer ba spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-6: gnod sems 'dod pa spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-8: sems kyi rnyog pa spang ba'i phyir gzhan gyi bstan pa spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-11: dge 'dun gyi yon tan la gus par bya ba la mi zad par mos shing nyan par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-12: bslab pa la mi zad par gus pa skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-13: kha na ma tho ba cung zad tsam la 'jigs par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-14: theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pas tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-15: ma rung ba skye ba la yang dag par gnas pa rnams skyo bas tshul khrims ma ral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-16: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs pas tshul khrims 'dres pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-17: chos dkar po 'phel bas mkhas pas mi smod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-19: ting nge 'dzin kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286a-20: dbang po drug srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-0: 'dod pa dang chags sems kyi 'dod pa rab tu spangs la bsam pa @286b bsngags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-1: lha dang mi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang 'thab mo'i 'du 'dzi can yongs su spangs pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-2: sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sems can snying rje med pa'i nang na 'dug pa la byams pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-3: sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-4: ngan 'gror 'gro ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-6: gzhan 'khrul pa la rtsod cing 'dor ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-8: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can mtha' med par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-9: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-10: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-12: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-15: yid yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-20: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-23: gzugs med pa'i phung po nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi lta ba kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-25: bag chags kyi mtshan ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:286b-27: mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-0: @287a *// rab tu spangs pa'i phyir rtsol ba de dang de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la'ang sems sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-1: 'god par byed pa de nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus dang tshul khrims kyi sems kyi go cha la brtson pa 'di'ang 'jig rten pa'i ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-3: gang gis go cha'i thabs la mkhas pas nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-4: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po'i rtsal gyis sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-5: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-6: 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-7: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dag yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-8: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam pa de lta bu'i skyes bu'i rtsal yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-10: de'i tshe gzhung 'dis gang nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-11: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar de ltar rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287a-12: byang chub sems dpa' ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-0: de @287b la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-1: sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-2: don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-5: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos bcings pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-6: bdag gi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis bcings pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-8: dper na; phyugs shing la btags pa ltar sdug bsngal myong bas na sems dang bsam pa la 'jig pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-10: yongs su bsdigs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-11: de chung ngu na sems kyi skad cig gcig gis kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po 'di sgom pa na de ltar bslab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-13: sems can 'di gang sems can 'di ming tsam zhig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-14: sems can 'di phyin ci log tsam zhig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-17: thog mar dge ba 'di sems can zhes bya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-18: yang dag pa ma yin par gti mug pa ma gtogs par shin tu mngon par mi sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-19: 'du byed sna tshogs kyi phyin ci log kun nas ldang ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba na sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-20: yid mi bde ba myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-21: 'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos po gar mkhan gyi mtshon 'dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:287b-23: rang bzhin gyi smig rgyu lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-0: 'khor ba la chags pa rnams bde bar 'dod cing @288a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-1: mngan par 'du bya ba des sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-2: chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du mi shes pa na kun tu sbyor bas 'khrul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-3: myos pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-4: gang gi 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba la 'khor lo stug po lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su 'khor ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis phyin ci log bzhi spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-5: ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i lam la dgod par bya zhing yang dag pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis yongs su smin par bya ba zhig snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-6: de sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-7: sems can rnams la dmigs pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-12: shed can du dmigs pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-13: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'ang rnam par mi spang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-14: bstan pa la mos pas sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-15: thabs la mkhas pas 'god par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-17: nags 'dabs su 'dug pa'i phyir spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288a-18: 'du 'dzi yongs su spang pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la lha dang mi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-2: 'du 'dzi spang pa'i phyir sems can de dag gi drung du nye bar phyin nas chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-3: bag la nyal ba spang pa'i phyir 'gro ba lnga la mngon par chags pa rjes su smon pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-4: nyes pa mang po'i lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-7: rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spang pa'i phyir dgon pa'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-8: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag gi gan du gus pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-9: de dag la'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims ston par byed pa de ni; sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims 'di'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-10: gang dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-11: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-14: bdag gir bya ba thams cad 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-15: myur du chos zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-16: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-17: sems can 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims can yang dang yang du sdug bsngal gyi zil gyis non cing 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa nga yir bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:288b-18: bdag gir bya ba la brten pa dag byang chub kyi lam rab tu mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-1: 'phrul chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems can rnams dgos pa med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-2: gang na bdag gi gnas med cing sems can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-7: shed can gyi gnas med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-8: gzugs kyi gnas med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-12: rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-13: sa'i khams kyi gnas med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-18: gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas shing rna ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-19: sgra'i mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-21: ro'i mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-23: reg bya'i mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-25: chos kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-28: yid kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-29: nga yir bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-31: chad pa'i mtshan ma la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-33: mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-38: nye bar rtog pa la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-43: gnyis pa'i mya ngan la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289a-47: khams gsum gyi rgyud la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-0: mngon @289b bar ma byas pa la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-2: sems dang yid kyi mtshan nyid la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-7: skad cig tu 'jig pa'i mtha'i rdul la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-8: mngon par mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-10: nyan thos kyi theg pa sdom pa la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-12: mtshan ma la mi gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la snyems par mi gnas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-14: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par spyod pa nam mkha' bzhin du gnas shing yang dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-15: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mtshungs par gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-16: zhen pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-17: chags pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-18: ye shes gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-19: rnal 'byor gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa na rtog pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-21: zag pa dang bcas pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-22: lam gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-23: nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'dren pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-25: rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:289b-26: thog ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-1: pas byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-2: 'jig rten gyi chos kyis gos pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-3: bdud kyi las kyis gos pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-4: bag chags kyi rjes su 'brel ba'i nyon mongs pas gos pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-5: phyogs bcur shes rab kyi snang bas ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-6: shes rab kyi stobs skyes pas yul thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ro; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-7: 'dod chags kyi 'khor bas ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa dang dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-9: rnam pa byang ba yongs su shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-10: chags pa thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-11: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-12: dben pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing 'du 'dzi thams cad la mngon par chags par yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-13: bsam gtan gyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-14: mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing 'du byed thams cad kyi yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-15: ma skyes pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing bdud bzhi'i yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290a-16: 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-0: 'phags pa'i skye bo'i @290b spyod yul ma yin par yang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-1: 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par shin tu 'das par yang 'gyur zhing 'jig rten thams cad kyi yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-2: ye shes kyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing byis pa'i yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-3: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yul mngon du'ang 'gyur zhing nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod pa la yang dag par dga' bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yul la spyad pa spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-5: yul thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i spyod yul la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-9: sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gzhol ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson pas bdud bzhi'i yul la dbye bar 'jug pa shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la brtson par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'ang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-11: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la'ang 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-12: dmigs pa thams cad kyi dge ba spyod pa la sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-13: nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par phye mar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-14: spros pa thams cad rab tu 'dod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:290b-15: lta ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-1: thams cad la'ang 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-2: rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-3: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa de lta bu'i don bya ba bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-5: yon tan gyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan don bya ba la sems can rnams 'god par byed pa 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu chen po'i khur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-8: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-9: gang sems can shin tu dbul po las yongs su thar bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-10: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'god par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-11: ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' la la rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi don bya bas sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-13: rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i don mthun pa sems can yongs su smin pa'i rtsal chen po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291a-14: rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-0: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod pa na gang gi tshe bdag @291b brtson par 'gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-1: yang na ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-2: yang na ni tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par 'gyur ba de dang der sems can rnams sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-7: gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pas zas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-8: skom nas yan lag gi dam pa mgo'i bar du gtong bar 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ston pa de la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-9: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srog gcod pa spangs shing sems can rnams la snying rje ba de de ltar srog gcod pa zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-10: sems can thams cad la snying rje bar sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la 'god par byed pa nas yang dag par lta ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-12: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag bzod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-13: bag la nyal ba spang ba'i phyir bzod pa sgom par byed pa nas mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa'i bar du de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed cing mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i bar du 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i lus kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:291b-15: dge ba'i ngag gi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-0: yid kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa @292a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-1: nas dge ba'i rgyur 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-3: snying rje chen po'i rgyur 'dus byas rnams rnam par mi spong ba de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-4: 'god par byed do; ;ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-5: rang rgyal ba 'dul ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas te bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-7: rang rgyal ba dang bral ba'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-8: byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed pa nas 'khyil ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-9: ldog pa'i bsam gtan thob pa'i bar du de la sems can rnams de dang de dag gi yon tan la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-11: ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa na thabs sna tshogs kyis shes rab kun 'byung bar byed do; ;ji ltar bdag mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-12: ji lta bur chos thams cad la ye shes thob cing pha rol ma yin pa'i rkyen mngon par shes pa de ltar sems can gyi rgyu'i phyir chos 'di dag 'byung ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292a-13: sems can yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-0: gang gi las kyis sems can rnams @292b dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par nus pa de'i bar du sbyor ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chags pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-1: sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do; ;sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-2: sems can rnams ji lta bur phra ba'i chos las ye shes mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub kyi spyod pa zab mo la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-3: las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i dran pa rnam par mi spong ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-4: gang byang chub sems dpa' chos dang sems la dbang byed par rab tu shes shing skad cig mar 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la'ang rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-5: sems can la snying rje chen po rnam par spong ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-6: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-7: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid du dmigs pa'ang med cing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:292b-8: sems can yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i rgyun ma bcad pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-1: byang chub sems dpa' lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-3: yid kyi 'du byed bdag med pa dang ldan pas chos ston pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-6: dbyangs la dmigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-7: las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-8: sems can rnams snying rje ba'i phyir yang sems can phyin ci log la yang dag par 'du ba med pa rnams la sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brel pa ston pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis 'du byed par mi dmigs shing gtong bar mi dmigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-10: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'ang ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-11: sems can la snying rje ba'i phyir yang sbyin pa byin par 'gyur la sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par yang ston par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-12: sbyin pa po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-13: yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can gyi lus spyod pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-15: mi gtsang ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293a-16: sems brag ca lta bur brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-0: 'du byed sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta @293b bur rab tu shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-1: sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba rnam par mi spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-4: yid kyi 'du byed la sbyor bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-5: rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-6: yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur bdag med cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshul khrims la rtog par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-7: spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-8: 'di la sems can gyi btang snyoms su rab tu sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-9: sems can rnams dang phung po gsum la sbyor bar byed pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-10: lhag pa'i tshul khrims su slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-12: lhag pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sems can yongs su smin pa bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-13: yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed skad cig tu 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-14: 'dus ma byas kyi gnas dang bral par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing sems can rnams la ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:293b-16: 'bras bu mtshungs par ston pa de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-1: sems dpa' ji ltar yang blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i 'du byed thams cad shes shing rgyu dang 'bras bur yang rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-2: chos thams cad skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-3: 'gog par dmigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-4: rgyu dang rkyen gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bral bar rab tu mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-5: sems can rnams yongs su smin pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-6: snying rje chen po'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-7: yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-8: phung po yongs su shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-9: ye shes mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-10: rgyu'i 'bras bu ston par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-11: sems can le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la dmigs pa'i sdug bsngal 'dzin pa la sbyor ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-12: byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed cing 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-18: kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294a-19: skad cig tu zad pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i 'du byed rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-0: sems can rnams la'ang phung po la brten pa'i @294b bsam gtan la tshangs par spyod pa mngon par shes pa thob pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-1: bsam gtan gyis nyon mongs pa spang bar byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-2: ces de ltar las gzhan ma yin pas sems can rnams bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-3: thob pa chen po thob par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-4: ces bsam gtan la sems sbyor bar byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-5: yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-7: khong khro ba gnyis ka dang bral bas thams cad btang snyoms thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-10: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-11: bsam gtan gyi dbang po la yid kyi 'du byed rnams rtog par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-12: rnam par rtog par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-13: sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba yongs su 'grub pa rab tu mi spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-14: shes rab sgom pa la brtson pas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra las rab tu thar par ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-15: sems can rnams thos pa dang bsam gtan la brtson zhing tshol ba sgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:294b-16: yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par khong du chud pas 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams chos de dang de dag la yang dag par gzhog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-0: @295a *// 'god par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir don mthun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrubs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can yongs su smin pa don mthun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-3: gzhan yang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-4: ngan song du spyod pa'i nyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-5: sems can nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-8: bskal pa'i rnyog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las smon lam gyi rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs la mngon par mi 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon lam mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-11: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-12: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-13: 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-14: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin pa skyed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-15: theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-0: de'ang 'dir de tsam gyis @295b byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-1: 'dir yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-2: byang chub thob pa na'ang sems can mtshams med pa byed pa nas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i bar du yongs su smin par 'gro zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa nyon mongs pa'i lta ba thams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-4: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen pos yongs su smin pa'i go cha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-5: gang byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can gyi go cha rnam pa de lta bus sems can yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-7: yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:295b-10: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-0: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen @296a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-1: po dang ldan pa bar 'ga' ci zhig tu skyes pa na sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-2: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-3: 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-4: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-5: dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-7: lta ba'i bag chags thams cad las sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-8: sems can re re'i don gyi phyir bskal pa'i sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa nas sems can de 'khor ba'i 'dam las sgrol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-9: sangs rgyas gcig gi thad du phul ba nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi thad kyi bar du phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-10: gang gi tshe sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par 'gyur ba de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-11: rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gangg'a'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'gro bar nus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-12: de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-13: de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296a-14: de na yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs chen po'ang ci 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-0: de na'ang rigs kyi bu de'i shin tu sred pa dang @296b ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-1: rigs kyi bu des yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs su zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-2: las cis na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur; sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-4: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bas 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas 'dres pa med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'dres pa med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-8: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs thams cad kyis 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-10: rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi skye ba ji tsam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang mi rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-11: byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgya che zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'gyur ro; ;byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-12: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rigs kyi bu de la ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-14: las gang dang gang spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-15: nan tan gang gis yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ba de'ang rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:296b-16: tshe rabs su yon tan dang spyod pa'i nan tan la brtson par 'gyur ba nas der skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-0: yon tan ji tsam pa thams cad yongs @297a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-1: su rdzogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-2: gang na rigs kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par spangs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra bar byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-6: sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-7: yongs su spyod pa byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-9: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-10: gang dag la chos ston pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar bya ba'i phyir ston gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-11: yongs su ma dag par ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bsngags par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-13: yongs su ma dag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-15: sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag dang 'grogs shing sten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-16: sdom pa la dgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-17: yon sbyong ba bsngags par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297a-18: yongs su ma dag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297b-0: rigs @297b kyi bu; gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis sngon rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thog mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297b-1: gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med grangs med par da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis sngon nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thog mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297b-2: 'dir yang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297b-3: mngon par shes pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297b-4: gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs tshad bzung ba dang brtags pa der phyin chad kyang skye bar smon lam byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:297b-5: der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:298a-0: yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @298a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:298a-1: chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de dag thams cad kyis rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thams cad kyi thog mar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:298a-2: gang gi tshe sems bskyed pas mngon par shes pa thob pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:298a-3: sa rab nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:298a-4: gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' dag da ltar chos kyi sgra sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang bral zhing chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-006:298a-6: gang yang chos zab me'i bzod pa thob pas dga' ba dang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
